amendment.description: To build roads at home instead of building them around the world.

vote.text: Amendment SA 441 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 8 - 92. Record Vote Number: 39.

action.text: Amendment SA 441 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S450-451; text: CR S450-451) To build roads at home instead of building them around the world.
